title: Help on this one appreciated
content:
Kind of a Golden Shred Marmalade feel here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137im_/http:/typophile.com/files/serial_4659.jpg)

Any suggestions?

Thank you

 [‹ Square Gothic from Eastern Promises Titles](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/typophile.com/node/48798 "Go to previous forum topic") [Virtual Logo Typeface ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/typophile.com/node/48795 "Go to next forum topic")
author: motuchop

comments.content: Classic British feel. You might like [P22 Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=P22+Underground&sample_text=S%20E%20R%20I%20A%20L&sample_size=60), [ITC Johnston](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ITC+Johnston&sample_text=S%20E%20R%20I%20A%20L&sample_size=60) or [Rian Hughes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rian%252BHughes)’ [Ministry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040137/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Ministry&sample_text=S%20E%20R%20I%20A%20L&sample_size=60). My bet’s it’s ITC Johnston.
BTW You’ll have to take care of the outline and shadow effect yourself. ;^)
